<small>Also see: [[H7684]]</small>

 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁגָה‎</span>] **verb** ==go astray, err== (Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׁגָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id.***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁגִיתִי‎</span> [[Job.6.24|Job 6:24]]; [[Job.19.4|Job 19:4]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשְׁגֶּה‎</span> [[Prov.5.23|Prov 5:23]], etc.; ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁגוֺת‎</span> [[Prov.19.27|Prov 19:27]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֹׁגֶה‎</span> [[Ezek.45.20|Ezek 45:20]]; [[Prov.20.1|Prov 20:1]], etc.; — 

**1.** ***err, stray***, of flock [[Ezek.34.6|Ezek 34:6]] (figurative). 

**2.** ***swerve, meander, reel*** or ***roll***, in drunkenness, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> of drink [[Isa.28.7|Isa 28:7]] (twice in verse); = ***be intoxicated***, [[Prov.20.1|Prov 20:1]] so with (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בּ‎</span>) love [[Prov.5.19|Prov 5:19]]; [[Prov.5.20|Prov 5:20]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּרֹאֶה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[Isa.28.7|Isa 28:7]]. 

**3.** ***go astay***, morally, [[1Sam.26.21|1Sam 26:21]]; [[Prov.5.23|Prov 5:23]]; [[Job.6.24|Job 6:24]]; [[Job.19.4|Job 19:4]], + [[1Sam.14.24|1Sam 14:24]] (reading <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁגָגָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span>) [[BDB#The|Th]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] [[BDB#Now|Now]] (after [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]]; otherwise [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [[BDB#HPS|HPS]]); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מן‎</span>, of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s commands [[Ps.119.21|Ps 119:21]]; [[Ps.119.118|Ps 119:118]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> of words of knowledge [[Prov.19.27|Prov 19:27]]. 

**4.** specifically ***commit sin of ignorance***, inadvertence [[Lev.4.13|Lev 4:13]]; [[Num.15.22|Num 15:22]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) [[Ezek.45.20|Ezek 45:20]] (compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁגג‎</span>). **Hiph\`il** ***lead astray:*** 

**1.** literal, ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַשְׁגֶּה‎</span> [[Deut.27.18|Deut 27:18]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּדֶּרֶךְ‎</span>). 

**2.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַשׁ‎</span> mentally = ***mislead*** [[Job.12.16|Job 12:16]]. 

**3.** morally, ***Participle*** [[Prov.28.10|Prov 28:10]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּדֶרֶךְ רָ֑ע‎</span>); ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּשְׁגֵּנִי‎</span>, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מן‎</span> of God's commands [[Ps.119.10|Ps 119:10]] + perhaps [[Job.12.23|Job 12:23]] ***leadeth*** nations ***astray*** ([[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] SvrVer, i.e. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּשְׁגֵּם‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּנְחֵם‎</span>).
